wikipedia_page.main:
Peter Whiston (born 4 January 1968) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender.
He notably played a solitary game in the Premier League for Southampton during the 1994–95 season. He also played in the Football League for Plymouth Argyle, Torquay United, Exeter City and Shrewsbury Town, as well as non-league side Stafford Rangers.

response: * Peter Whiston (born 1968), English retired football defender
